channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ESPN's Ryan Clark, Scott Van Pelt apologize for 'SportsCenter' comments about Kyren Lacy's alleged role in fatal car crash
Federal Agricultural Mortgage (AGM): Evaluating Valuation After Recent 20.7% Share Price Decline
Diddy judge offers hip-hop mogul a way to cut up to a year off his prison sentence
Daytona Beach police officer charged with DUI
Republican unity to avoid shutdown concessions is cracking after 6 failed votes

item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Endangered ferrets in more jeopardy as government shutdown drags on
item.description: With biologists from the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service furloughed because of the shutdown, a critical release of 400 captive-bred ferrets is at risk.

item.title: WATCH: The story behind the viral surprise father-daughter wedding dance video
item.description: Marissa Nielsen surprised her dad Greg Wickles by inviting her three older sisters to join in on a father-daughter dance at her wedding.

item.title: Judge ruling on National Guard lawsuit filed by Illinois, Chicago today
item.description: A judge is set to rule on a lawsuit filed by Illinois and Chicago seeking to prevent the National Guard from being deployed by the federal government ...

item.title: WATCH: Crypto scam almost costs woman her life savings
item.description: The FBI says scams perpetrated using bitcoin ATMs cost Americans nearly $250 million in 2024, more than double the sum from the previous year.

item.title: How the potential Gaza ceasefire deal may face challenges
item.description: There are many questions surrounding the Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal and what it means for the region.

item.title: Arturo Gatti Jr., son of late boxing champion, dies at age 17
item.description: Gatti Jr. was 10 months old when his father, who was a world champion in two weight classes, died at age 37 in July 2009.

item.title: Trump says Israeli hostages should be released "Monday or Tuesday"
item.description: Trump says Hamas will likely release all Israeli hostages by early next week, as the "first phase" of a deal to end the war in Gaza is expected to tak...

item.title: AP reader question: How might the federal shutdown affect the economy?
item.description: Here’s a question submitted by an Associated Press reader: How might the government shutdown affect the U.S. economy?

item.description: The acquisition brings together two major players providing key infrastructure for voting and voter verification systems across dozens of states ahead...
